transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan bolo.
Customer: Haan ji, Luksh ji se baat ho rahi hai from True Man.
Executive: Hmm. Haan.
Customer: Okay okay actually sir ek important discussion karna tha aapse main business manager baat kar raha hun sir Vivek Mishra from IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Sir aapne ek concern raise kiya hua hai usi ke regarding maine call kiya hai aapko.
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Haan to main dekh raha hun sir aapne jo mail drop kiya hai hume.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hai na wo refund ke liye kiya hai sir.
Customer: Haan ji haan.
Executive: Main dekh raha hun sir abhi to do mahine hue hain sir aapko aisa kya ho gaya sir.
Customer: Aise hi wo refund aise close karna hai IndiaMART.
Executive: Main wahi main wahi keh raha hun sir abhi to do mahine hue hain aisa kya ho gaya.
Customer: Nahi maza nahi raha aa raha hai business mein.

Customer: Hello. Haan ji.
Customer: Jo mail drop kiya hai wo kar do kaam aisa bol raha hun.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Mail drop aapko kiya hai na wo kar do aisa bol raha hun main.
Executive: Sir main wahi puch raha hun hum I understand reason dunga aapko reason dekh dekh ke thak jaunga.
Executive: Sir ye to aapne pehli baar matlab raise kiya hai refund ke liye isse pehle aapne kabhi refund ke liye raise nahi kiya tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Isse pehle aapne kabhi refund ke liye raise nahi kiya hai sir.
Customer: Kya karu aapko wahi main bulwana chahta hun kya bolu main aapko samajh mein aa raha hai.
Executive: Main ye keh raha hun sir abhi to do mahine hue hain na sir services ko aapki.
Customer: Are yaar fir se wahi baat wo ab business nahi karna hai IndiaMART se ek hi reason hai aur koi reason nahi bolu aapko.
Executive: Sir to aapka ye shoes ka business hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir shoes ka business hai aapka aur isme to hamare pass buyleads vagera bhi hai. buyleads ka business hai sab kuch hai sir matlab kya bolte hain shoes ka business hai aapka isme hamare pass achi khasi buyleads bhi hai sir aisa to nahi hai ki buyleads nahi aa rahi hai sir buyleads bhi aa hi rahi hai aapne halaki last month use nahi kiya hai services to kuch to raha hoga na sir aisa kya reason raha hai sir main wo samajhna chah raha hun.
Customer: Reason to aapko bol diya ek reason 100 martaba bolu kya karu.
Executive: Aap kya aapne business band kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha. But aisa kaise ho sakta hai sir abhi to aapne matlab do mahine pehle yahan par aap onboard hue hain aisa kaise ho sakta hai sir ki abhi suddenly business aap band kar rahe hain.
Customer: Koi bhi business ka decision aap ek hi baar aap mujhe gol ghuma ke puch rahe ho lo baat karo ek kaam karo bade bhai se.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan main aapko ek baar bolta raha hun mere bhai ki mujhe business hi band karna hai ye kapde line ka business band karna hun.
Executive: Sir main wahi samajhna chah raha hun ki ek dam se aisa kya ho gaya.
Customer: Bas ab aapko bol diya ab aap kar dijiye theek hai sir main ab aapko jyada nahi bol sakta hun theek hai mujhe already bahut tension hai aap mujhe dusre bhi bahut sab kaam karne hain theek hai sir ab aapko main baar baar ek baat nahi karunga.
Executive: Ek last cheez mere ko confirm kar dijiye sir ye aapne ek second ye jo number hai jispe baat ho rahi hai ye hai 094.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hai na aur ek aur number hai 459 wala ye aap hi ka number hai sir jiske end 59 hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan haan boliye.
Executive: Haan to kyunki sir aapne na ye jo refund ka request hai ye aapne aaj se pehle kabhi nahi dala hai to main bas ye samajhna.
Customer: Meri baat suniye aap main ab aapko sir aap jo baat baat pe ghadi ghadi ek baat kar rahe ho na wo baat main nahi sun raha hun main aapko sirf itna bol raha hun ki mujhe refund chahiye bas.
Executive: Kya cheez sir?
Customer: Aapka pride naam number dijiye na mere ko phone dena.
Executive: Sir main ek cheez to mere ko confirm kar dijiye sir aapne pehle confirm to kar raha hun ki business close ho raha hai aap refund kijiye ab isse bada aapko kya confirm karwaun main aapke sath.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai fir main aapka ye jo agar wali kya ho sakta hai agar hum karte bhi hain to kya bolte hain ye aapka pro rata basis pe hoga sir yani ki jitni time aapki service chali hai sir utna

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji hello. Haan to aap jo bol rahe ho na jitni time service chali hai wo kitna hua mujhe boliye to.
Executive: Sir ye aapka roughly hoga do mahine ka aapne pay kiya tha waise total one second.
Executive: 32000 plus GST aapne pay kiya tha to around 3000 hai aapka to do mahine ke hisab se around 6000 aapka deduct hoga. aur baki jo hai aapka wo most probably aapka refund hoga sir wo ek bar lekin mere ko sir ek last cheez aap bata dijiye aapne mail jo kiya hai wo kiya hai please refund my package amount I am not getting any response from the customers aapne ye nahi likha hai sir ki mere ko main I am closing my business aapne ye likha hai ki mujhe response nahi mil raha hai customer se.
Customer: Dhandha nahi karna hai.
Executive: To sir aapne mail pe to ye likha hai na ki mujhe customer se response nahi mil raha hai.
Customer: Are to customer se response nahi mil raha hai yani mujhe dhandha hi cross karna hai na bhaiya.
Executive: Aapne wahi keh raha hun sir aap jo charges katne ka meri baat suno aap jo charges katne ka bol rahe ho na wo charges le lo baki ka refund kar do mujhe dhandha close karna hai okay jara main mere kaam se ja raha hun.
Executive: Theek hai. Haan theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for the subscription.

- Wants to close the business.



Resolution:

- Explained pro rata basis refund policy.

- Informed about deduction of 6000.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, business close, pro rata
